title: League of Legends doesnt resume the download progress but instead downloads 16gb again
body: So due to new pc i got, i had to install league of legends again, downloaded 10gb and then after that my internet connection got lost for a couple of hours of maintenance so i closed the client. After i got connection i opened the client and it started downloading whole 16gb again instead of resuming from when i closed, so now in installation folder i got useless 10gb that takes my hdd memory and i need to download again 16gb so i can play it.

replies.body: Yeeeeeaaaaaa it's a little unfortunate but our patcher doesn't have a pause or resume function built in yet. I know it's not quite what you're wanting to hear, but you do need to let that download finish all in one go.
FWIW, i had the patcher download 4GB worth of data for the recent patch (and I play regularly, the client was updated to the previous patch)
